document_data.caption: The Guard Barracks (building labeled 7) ''circa'' 1357 [[DR]].
document_data.name: Guard Barracks
document_data.organizations: Organizations in the Guard Barracks (Dock Ward)
document_data.mainbody: These '''Guard Barracks''' housed the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the city's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]].
document_data.Location: These barracks were located along the [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]], close to the [[Smokehouse (Waterdeep)|Smokehouse]] and the [[East Torch Tower]].<ref><ref group="note" name="error">The map provided of the Dock Ward in ''[[City of Splendors: Waterdeep]]'' notably mislabels the barracks as being on the nearby beach and gives the location where they are supposed to be the designation "S57," which is not used for any building in its index.
document_data.Structure: This building was three-stories tall. Like all barracks of the City Watch, it was built to be fireproof.
